data.text: @annwmac @CBCNS Thier is not 320 in hospital suffering from COVID, stop spreading bull 💩. They are in hospital suffering from other reasons and have COVID as well.
@Robrt_McMillan @CBCNS I think the use of the word “blip” is an understatement.
@CBCNS Don’t the cases always start going down as we get closer to spring.

@CBCNS Our hospitals are not an island. A lull in one doesn’t mean all is well and life is returning to normal. They aren’t. At all. Here’s the charted hospitalizations as of March 2. As of Friday the 4th, there were 320 people in NS hospitals suffering from Covid. https://t.co/YCEvDkGfZL
@CBCNS This article is a good argument for keeping restrictions a little longer to give hospitals time to recoup.
